Based on your preference cues of a novella with themes of what and kind, I would recommend the book "A Christmas Carol" written by Charles Dickens. This classic novel tells the story of a man named Scrooge who is known for his miserly ways. However, when three ghosts visit him on Christmas Eve, he is forced to confront his past mistakes and become a better person.
This classic novel not only provides an entertaining and inspiring story, but also contains timeless and relevant themes such as kindness, generosity, compassion, empathy, forgiveness, and personal growth that can be applied to various aspects of life.
